sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
form
  p {{ quest.id }}
  container(v-for="(ans, key, index) in quest.answers" :key="key")
    input(
      type='radio'
      name='index'
      :value='ans.correct'
      v-model="answer"
      @change="submit(quest.id)"
      :id='key'
    )
    label(:for='key') {{  ans.text }}
    br
  br
  span {{ answer }}
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "HelloWorld",
  data() {
    return {
      answer: null,
      isAnswered: false,
    };
  },
  props: {
    // text: String,
    // answers: [],
    quest: {},
  },
  methods: {
    submit(id) {
      console.log(id);
      console.log(this.answer);
      this.$emit("submit", this.answer, this.isAnswered, id);
      this.isAnswered = this.answer;
      // if (this.answer) this.isAnswered = true;
      // if (!this.answer) this.isAnswered = false;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="stylus">
h3
  margin 40px 0 0

ul
  list-style-type none
  padding 0

li
  display inline-block
  margin 0 10px

a
  color #42b983
</style>
